segments.text: I observe the aproned woman at work.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress sways as she dries the dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel bunches in her hands.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unseen by her, water floods the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over, soaking the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children's antics add to the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stretches tall on the tilting stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But danger lurks in that height.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her open palm shows pure hope.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cabinet doors swing open wide.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside calm contrasts this indoor storm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away from the potential fall.
segments.speaker: PAR
